New version of llpp (tagged v12) is no available at http://repo.or.cz/w/llpp.git
Blurb:
llpp a graphical PDF viewer which aims to superficially resemble less(1)
Changes:
* MuPDF[1] had a 1.0 release. * Split columns mode * Hints mode a la conkeror[2] (handy for mouseless navigation) * Made sure that things do run under Cygwin's X and XQuartz
[1] http://mupdf.com/ [2] http://conkeror.org/
